Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Clark/Touhy
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Morse, Sheridan and Howard due to, street blockage near Clark/Touhy.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Morse, Sheridan and Howard due to, street blockage near Clark/Touhy.

Allow extra travel time.
